TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_trv_Damayan, title = Damayan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Seediq]}, url = {https://trv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Damayan} }

S.FORM: = Damayan = Gaga mniq Hwareyseyn Wanjungsyang ka alang Damayan. 86 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 246 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 97% niqan 239 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 3% niqan 7 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Bunun 87%, Paiwan 2%, ni rahuq na o 8%. Nniqan alang Nyusan Skanki nsgan Maribasi alang Damayan. Klegan seejiq nealang Bunun. Djiyun kari Kari Bunun.

= Damayan = Gaga mniq Hwareyseyn Wanjongsyang ka alang Damayan. 86 sapah ka kneego na sapah, 246 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnposo seejiq o mangal 97% niqan 239 hiyi sp, rahoq na oxay tnposo seejiq o mangal 3% niqan 7 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Bonon 87%, Paiwan 2%, ni rahoq na o 8%. Nniqan alang Nyosan Skanki nsgan Maribasi alang Damayan. Klegan seejiq nealang Bonon. Djiyon kari Kari Bonon.
